markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Undying Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1291) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 19 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=83)

</column>

---

You resist death's clutches with supernatural vigor. When you use Orc Ferocity, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.
name: Undying Ferocity
